output.sentences: The trip to the resort made for a jawdropping vacation!
The children had an incredible time, playing and running until they were exhausted.
Dad snapped great photos of the mountainside.
Mom found some beautiful flowers and picked a couple.
After the day's activities, everyone took a long walk on the beach.
